R

relaxedEntityHeadMatch(PairInstance) - Method in class elkfed.coref.algorithms.sieve.Sieve
Returns true if the mention head matches any word in the antecedent entity.
RelaxedHeadMatchSieve - Class in elkfed.coref.algorithms.sieve
This Sieve links a Mention to an antecedent, if they both are named entities with the same semantic class and the mentions head word matches any word in the antecedents Discourse Entity.
RelaxedHeadMatchSieve(List<Mention>) - Constructor for class elkfed.coref.algorithms.sieve.RelaxedHeadMatchSieve
 
RelaxedStringMatchSieve - Class in elkfed.coref.algorithms.sieve
This sieve considers two nominal mentions as coreferent, if the strings obtained by dropping the text following their head words (such as relative clauses and PP and participial postmodifiers) are identical (e.g., [Clinton] and [Clinton, whose term ends in January]).
RelaxedStringMatchSieve(List<Mention>) - Constructor for class elkfed.coref.algorithms.sieve.RelaxedStringMatchSieve
 
runSieve(Mention) - Method in class elkfed.coref.algorithms.sieve.PreciseConstructSieve
 
runSieve(Mention) - Method in class elkfed.coref.algorithms.sieve.PronounMatchSieve
 
runSieve(Mention) - Method in class elkfed.coref.algorithms.sieve.ProperHeadNounMatchSieve
 
runSieve(Mention) - Method in class elkfed.coref.algorithms.sieve.RelaxedHeadMatchSieve
 
runSieve(Mention) - Method in class elkfed.coref.algorithms.sieve.RelaxedStringMatchSieve
 
runSieve(Mention) - Method in class elkfed.coref.algorithms.sieve.Sieve
Abstract method that uses the particular rules of a sieve to look for an antecedent for a mention in the list of mentions that was provided to the sieve.
runSieve(Mention) - Method in class elkfed.coref.algorithms.sieve.SpeakerIdentificationSieve
 
runSieve(Mention) - Method in class elkfed.coref.algorithms.sieve.StrictHeadMatchASieve
 
runSieve(Mention) - Method in class elkfed.coref.algorithms.sieve.StrictHeadMatchBSieve
 
runSieve(Mention) - Method in class elkfed.coref.algorithms.sieve.StrictHeadMatchCSieve
 
runSieve(Mention) - Method in class elkfed.coref.algorithms.sieve.StringMatchSieve
